meanings.definition: A sweet, edible fruit of a rose plant.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe ras from the rose bush.
meanings.sent2: The ras was juicy and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The ras made a perfect addition to my fruit salad.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and sweet as a ras.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the ras filled the room with a delightful fragrance.

meanings.definition: The act of scraping or abrading the skin.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to get a ras while climbing the tree.
meanings.sent2: The ras on his knee stung a little.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the ras on her elbow was a battle scar.
meanings.sent4: The rough sandpaper felt like a ras against his palm.
meanings.sent5: The ras from falling off the bike left a small mark on his leg.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement equal to 1/32 of an inch.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter measured the wood with a ras.
meanings.sent2: The precision required a ras to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: He chuckled at the tiny size of a ras.
meanings.sent4: The distance was so short, it felt like a ras away.
meanings.sent5: The seamstress used a ras to make precise cuts in the fabric.

meanings.definition: A traditional Ethiopian and Eritrean music genre.
meanings.sent1: The rhythmic beats of the ras filled the air.
meanings.sent2: She danced gracefully to the sounds of the ras.
meanings.sent3: The lively ras music had everyone on their feet.
